Title: 关于2025年端午节期间有关工作安排的通知
Source_Sentence: The price limit of alumina futures contracts is adjusted to 9%, the margin ratio for hedging transactions is adjusted to 10%, and the margin ratio for speculative transactions is adjusted to 11%

Title: 关于2025年端午节期间有关工作安排的通知
Source_Sentence: The price limit of silver futures contracts is adjusted to 12%, the margin ratio for hedging transactions is adjusted to 13%, and the margin ratio for speculative transactions is adjusted to 14%

Title: 关于2025年端午节期间有关工作安排的通知
Source_Sentence: The price limit range of gold futures contracts was adjusted to 13%, the margin ratio for hedging transactions was adjusted to 14%, and the margin ratio for speculative transactions was adjusted to 15

Title: 关于2025年端午节期间有关工作安排的通知
Source_Sentence: The price limits and trading margin ratios of gold futures contracts will be restored to their original levels

Title: 关于2025年端午节期间有关工作安排的通知

Title: Notice on the listing and trading of cast aluminum alloy futures
Source_Sentence: The trading margin is 9% of the contract value (the hedging margin is 8% of the contract value)
